text: Regan David Riley (born 12 November 2002) is an English professional footballer who plays for Bolton Wanderers. ==Career== Riley joined the Bolton Wanderers F.C. Academy when he was nine years old.The Bolton News: "Bolton youngster to be given first-team shot after EFL Trophy display" On 17 August 2019, Riley made his Bolton Wanderers debut as a second half substitute in a 5–0 loss away to Tranmere Rovers, in a Bolton team made up largely of youth players, due to financial difficulties.
